Package src.client

Class Player

java.lang.Object
src.client.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class representing a player

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String pseudo, boolean alive, int score, int tieBreakScore)
      Main constructor
      Parameters:
      pseudo - pseudo of the player
      alive - whether the player is currently alive or not (he already loses the game)
      score - main score of the player
      tieBreakScore - tie-breaking score of the player

    • Player

      public Player(String pseudo)
      Small constructor Creates only the object (with the pseudo), the other parameters are automaticaly initialized for a start of a game
      Parameters:
      pseudo - pseudo of the player

  • Method Details

    • compare

      public int compare(Player p)
      Compare the player with another
      Parameters:
      p - the other player to compare
      Returns:
      1 or more if this player is better than the player p 0 if they are equality -1 or less if the player p is better than this player

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the stats of the player (for a new game)

    • display

      public String display()
      Get the text to print in the multiplayers endgame box
      Returns:
      text to print in the endgame box with more than 2 players

    • getString

      public String getString(boolean tieBreakScore)
      Get the text to print in the 2 players endgame box
      Parameters:
      tieBreakScore - wether to print the tie-breaking score or not
      Returns:
      a text to print in the display box

    • getString

      public String getString()
      Default function for getString
      Returns:
      the text to print in the 2 players endgame box without tie-breaking score

    • compareAndReturnString

      public String[] compareAndReturnString(Player p)
      Create the entire text to print in the display box for a 2 players game
      Parameters:
      p - the other player to compare
      Returns:
      an array of texts {title, message} to print in the display box

    • getPseudo

      public String getPseudo()
      Get the pseudo of the player
      Returns:
      pseudo of the player

    • getAlive

      public boolean getAlive()
      Get if the player is still alive
      Returns:
      true if the player is still alive, false if he has already lost

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Get the main score the the player
      Returns:
      main score

    • getTieBreakScore

      public int getTieBreakScore()
      Get the tie-breaking score of the player
      Returns:
      tie-breaking score

    • setAlive

      public void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Set if the player is still alive or not
      Parameters:
      alive - new value to set

      public void setScore(int score)
      Set the score of the player
      Parameters:
      score - new score of the player

    • setTieBreakScore

      public void setTieBreakScore(int score)
      Set the tie-breaking score of the player
      Parameters:
      score - new tie-breaking score of the player
